summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Maya Groom Pro pet grooming appointment app. All backend APIs (22 tests) passed. Frontend calendar features, appointment creation/editing, and all view modes working correctly. No 'Script error' bug detected - previous fix confirmed working.

issues: Minor: Missing aria-describedby for DialogContent (accessibility warning in console)

passed_tests: Backend: Appointments CRUD with date filtering (4 tests)
Frontend: Calendar week view shows Mon-Sun correctly
Frontend: Calendar month popover opens with navigation arrows
Frontend: Calendar zoom controls (zoom in/out buttons) work
Frontend: Calendar view switches (week, month, list views)
Frontend: New appointment creation - NO Script error
Frontend: Client selection in appointment modal
Frontend: Pet addition with name entry
Frontend: Status dropdown in edit mode
Frontend: SMS, Invoice, Delete buttons in edit mode
critical_code_review_comments: Calendar.jsx: Well-structured with zoom controls, time indicator, and drag-drop scaffolding
AppointmentModal.jsx: Clean implementation with proper error handling and toast notifications
Minor: Add aria-describedby to DialogContent for better accessibility
seed_data_creation: Test appointments and services created during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core features tested and working. Calendar has zoom controls (50%-200%), month navigation popover, current time indicator (red line + flashing dot), and drag-drop scaffolding. Appointment modal supports client/pet/service selection, recurring appointments, and edit mode with SMS/Invoice/Delete options. Test user: test@maya.com/test123 with client 'John Doe' and pet 'Buddy'.
